scripts.build:layer: rm -rf build/layer; mkdir build/layer build/layer/nodejs; cp package*.json build/layer/nodejs; (cd build/layer/nodejs; npm i) && (cd build/layer; zip -r ./nodemodules.zip .)
scripts.build: rm -rf build/source; mkdir build/source; cp -R parser index.js build/source && (cd build/source; zip -r ./source.zip .)
scripts.build:api: rm -rf build/api; mkdir build/api; cp -R api build/api && (cd build/api; zip -r ./api.zip .)
scripts.build:api:layer: rm -rf build/api-layer; mkdir build/api-layer build/api-layer/nodejs; cp api/package*.json build/api-layer/nodejs; (cd build/api-layer/nodejs; npm i) && (cd build/api-layer; zip -r ./api-nodemodules.zip .)
